oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of William G. Brownlow
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Duplicated by a photography studio in Newton, New Jersey and with a tax revenue stamp on the back, this cdv image may have been reproduced and distributed during Brownlow's wartime book tour in the North. This image is from Brownlow's wartime days as a pro-Union newspaper editor and agitator and before his stint as Tennessee's Reconstruction governor.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Brownlow, William G.
